metadata.synopsis: This is dialogue played by the ward device placed on the wall in Devil's Fee.It resembles the head of the imp or the devil.When the player resolves the puzzle by combining this head device with any liquid bottle ward disables the trap and throws this AD. It will repeat it when clicked.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AGoto -47 11Click on the head, place water bottle or any drink into combo UI, click combine.

0.speaker: GROUP_DiabolistTrap_Imp
0.text: Too wet. Too cold. No fun. Begone!
0.context: NodeContext: Annoyed, like a child that's had its toy ripped out of its hands
